title: OM Spa of Regal Riverside Hotel presents Summer Blossom RetreatTravelandtourworld.com
text:
OM Spa of Regal Riverside Hotel presents Summer Blossom Retreat Published on : Wednesday, August 26, 2015
Embark on a sensory journey with infusion of floral full body scrub and therapeutic massage that offers you a pure relaxation. From now until 30 September 2015, OM Spa at Regal Riverside Hotel is delighted to bring you an indulgent “Summer Blossom Retreat” that will give you the best rejuvenation.
Introducing professionally trained native Thai therapists complemented with imported massage treatment products, OM Spa delivers an authentic traditional Thai massage to kick out the stress and restore fitness and strength of the entire body. Designed for taking away stress after a hectic day, the newly-launched 80-minute ritual begins with a fragrant Chamomile and Lavender Salt Scrub to exfoliate dead skin and promote cellular renewal. Complete with an energetic Rebalancing Massage to strengthen and revitalize your body through gentle stretching, bending and mild muscle manipulation. Finally, a cup of house-blended floral tea will be offered to make a heavenly perfect end leaving you invigorated.
Visit our official website and download e-coupon to enjoy 80-minute Summer Blossom Retreat, incorporating Chamomile and Lavender Scrub plus a Rebalancing Massage, at HK$580 only (original price HK$1,060). To further enliven your journey, you may get pampered with our purifying 40-minute Collage Organic Facial Treatment to promote growth of new collagen fibers at extra HK$300.
